description:
http://www.CityTV.nl
http://www.t-dose.org/

27 October 2012

T-DOSE 2012 conference, Opening: Jean-Paul Saman 
Keynote Speaker: Lennart Poettering.

Lennart is well known for his developments on PulseAudio and Systemd (a Sys V init replacements). He has a fresh look on todays issues and comes up with surprising solutions.

T-DOSE 2012 Playlist:
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBZBIkixHEieUwHjKqPMc9ckLLsMKiK4j

27 and 28 October 2012 at the Fontys University of Applied Science in Eindhoven.

In the first part we've some bad sound moments, sorry.
title: T-DOSE 2012 Open Source, Lennart Poettering, believe in free software, Eindhoven
